text:
@SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer Mortality (Death)  of SARS 10% ( Worst ),   as of now Coronavirus 1.4%.   Flu 0.1%,   Cold 0%  It is a Hoax!  But, maybe a goodway to take off for a couple Weeks! 
Ha ha ha!  Democrats trying to use Coronavirus to collapse Economies around the World for an Election!
